content: **please note ** if you are using a thicker yarn shorten your number of row in everything except the tail and ears legs should be 4 repeats and body only 3 or follow directions in pattern to use worsted weight yarn **supplies ** worsted weight yarn i used simply soft crochet hooks in size h and e stuffing amigurumi eyes or buttons scraps of black felt pink embroidery floss 6 inch pipe cleaner embriodery needle black thread darning needle pattern pieces for eye and mouth color availible on my blog see link above
